welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Braine-l'Alleud, a charming and historic city known for its beautiful architecture and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and have the opportunity to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights and is the largest terminal at Brussels Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and Schengen area flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.
